text: Elton Santiago dos Santos Lira or simply Lira (born 21 September 1986) is a Brazilian footballer CRB. ==External links== * *Elton Lira at Footballzz Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Clube Atlético Juventus players Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Zbrojovka Brno players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Association football midfielders
